attributes.action: Suspend business rates for all retail companies for at least 3 months
attributes.additional_details: Businesses (and consequently their employees) such as those in London Chinatown have suffered huge losses since January 2020 as a result of coronavirus. The government should suspend all business rates for retail and hospitality businesses for at least 3 months
attributes.background: The announcement to give 100% discount on business rates for retail businesses that have a rateable value below £51,000 do not go far enough. The majority of small and medium sized retail and hospitality businesses in central London would not fall under that threshold.
